Tables.Name: Cities
Tables.Description: Cities that are part of any address (including geographic location)

Columns.Name: CityID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a city within the database

Columns.Name: StateProvinceID
Columns.Description: State or province for this city

Columns.Name: LatestRecordedPopulation
Columns.Description: Latest available population for the City

Tables.Name: Countries
Tables.Description: Countries that contain the states or provinces (including geographic boundaries)

Columns.Name: CountryID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a country within the database

Columns.Name: FormalName
Columns.Description: Full formal name of the country as agreed by United Nations

Columns.Name: IsoAlpha3Code
Columns.Description: 3 letter alphabetic code assigned to the country by ISO

Columns.Name: IsoNumericCode
Columns.Description: Numeric code assigned to the country by ISO

Columns.Name: CountryType
Columns.Description: Type of country or administrative region

Columns.Name: LatestRecordedPopulation
Columns.Description: Latest available population for the country

Columns.Name: Border
Columns.Description: Geographic border of the country as described by the United Nations

Tables.Name: DeliveryMethods
Tables.Description: Ways that stock items can be delivered (ie: truck/van, post, pickup, courier, etc.

Columns.Name: DeliveryMethodID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a delivery method within the database

Columns.Name: DeliveryMethodName
Columns.Description: Full name of methods that can be used for delivery of customer orders

Tables.Name: PaymentMethods
Tables.Description: Ways that payments can be made (ie: cash, check, EFT, etc.

Columns.Name: PaymentMethodID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a payment type within the database

Columns.Name: PaymentMethodName
Columns.Description: Full name of ways that customers can make payments or that suppliers can be paid

Tables.Name: People
Tables.Description: People known to the application (staff, customer contacts, supplier contacts)

Columns.Name: PersonID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a person within the database

Columns.Name: PreferredName
Columns.Description: Name that this person prefers to be called

Columns.Name: SearchName
Columns.Description: Name to build full text search on (computed column)

Columns.Name: IsPermittedToLogon
Columns.Description: Is this person permitted to log on?

Columns.Name: IsExternalLogonProvider
Columns.Description: Is logon token provided by an external system?

Columns.Name: HashedPassword
Columns.Description: Hash of password for users without external logon tokens

Columns.Name: IsSystemUser
Columns.Description: Is the currently permitted to make online access?

Columns.Name: IsSalesperson
Columns.Description: Is this person a staff salesperson?

Columns.Name: UserPreferences
Columns.Description: User preferences related to the website (holds JSON data)

Columns.Name: CustomFields
Columns.Description: Custom fields for employees and salespeople

Columns.Name: OtherLanguages
Columns.Description: Other languages spoken (computed column from custom fields)

Tables.Name: StateProvinces
Tables.Description: States or provinces that contain cities (including geographic location)

Columns.Name: StateProvinceID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a state or province within the database

Columns.Name: StateProvinceCode
Columns.Description: Common code for this state or province (such as WA - Washington for the USA)

Columns.Name: StateProvinceName
Columns.Description: Formal name of the state or province

Columns.Name: Border
Columns.Description: Geographic boundary of the state or province

Columns.Name: LatestRecordedPopulation
Columns.Description: Latest available population for the StateProvince

Tables.Name: SystemParameters
Tables.Description: Any configurable parameters for the whole system

Columns.Name: SystemParameterID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for row holding system parameters

Columns.Name: DeliveryAddressLine1
Columns.Description: First address line for the company

Columns.Name: DeliveryAddressLine2
Columns.Description: Second address line for the company

Columns.Name: DeliveryCityID
Columns.Description: ID of the city for this address

Columns.Name: DeliveryLocation
Columns.Description: Geographic location for the company office

Columns.Name: PostalAddressLine1
Columns.Description: First postal address line for the company

Columns.Name: PostalAddressLine2
Columns.Description: Second postaladdress line for the company

Columns.Name: PostalCityID
Columns.Description: ID of the city for this postaladdress

Columns.Name: PostalPostalCode
Columns.Description: Postal code for the company when sending via mail

Tables.Name: TransactionTypes
Tables.Description: Types of customer, supplier, or stock transactions (ie: invoice, credit note, etc.)

Columns.Name: TransactionTypeID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a transaction type within the database

Columns.Name: TransactionTypeName
Columns.Description: Full name of the transaction type

Tables.Name: PurchaseOrderLines
Tables.Description: Detail lines from supplier purchase orders

Columns.Name: PurchaseOrderLineID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a line on a purchase order within the database

Columns.Name: PurchaseOrderID
Columns.Description: Purchase order that this line is associated with

Columns.Name: StockItemID
Columns.Description: Stock item for this purchase order line

Columns.Name: OrderedOuters
Columns.Description: Quantity of the stock item that is ordered

Columns.Name: Description
Columns.Description: Description of the item to be supplied (Often the stock item name but could be supplier description)

Columns.Name: ReceivedOuters
Columns.Description: Total quantity of the stock item that has been received so far

Columns.Name: ExpectedUnitPricePerOuter
Columns.Description: The unit price that we expect to be charged

Columns.Name: LastReceiptDate
Columns.Description: The last date on which this stock item was received for this purchase order

Columns.Name: IsOrderLineFinalized
Columns.Description: Is this purchase order line now considered finalized? (Receipted quantities and weights are often not precise)

Tables.Name: PurchaseOrders
Tables.Description: Details of supplier purchase orders

Columns.Name: PurchaseOrderID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a purchase order within the database

Columns.Name: OrderDate
Columns.Description: Date that this purchase order was raised

Columns.Name: DeliveryMethodID
Columns.Description: How this purchase order should be delivered

Columns.Name: ContactPersonID
Columns.Description: The person who is the primary contact for this purchase order

Columns.Name: ExpectedDeliveryDate
Columns.Description: Expected delivery date for this purchase order

Columns.Name: SupplierReference
Columns.Description: Supplier reference for our organization (might be our account number at the supplier)

Columns.Name: IsOrderFinalized
Columns.Description: Is this purchase order now considered finalized?

Columns.Name: Comments
Columns.Description: Any comments related this purchase order (comments sent to the supplier)

Columns.Name: InternalComments
Columns.Description: Any internal comments related this purchase order (comments for internal reference only and not sent to the supplier)

Tables.Name: SupplierCategories
Tables.Description: Categories for suppliers (ie novelties, toys, clothing, packaging, etc.)

Columns.Name: SupplierCategoryID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a supplier category within the database

Columns.Name: SupplierCategoryName
Columns.Description: Full name of the category that suppliers can be assigned to

Tables.Name: Suppliers
Tables.Description: Main entity table for suppliers (organizations)

Columns.Name: SupplierID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a supplier within the database

Columns.Name: SupplierName
Columns.Description: Supplier's full name (usually a trading name)

Columns.Name: DeliveryMethodID
Columns.Description: Standard delivery method for stock items received from this supplier

Columns.Name: DeliveryCityID
Columns.Description: ID of the delivery city for this address

Columns.Name: PostalCityID
Columns.Description: ID of the mailing city for this address

Columns.Name: SupplierReference
Columns.Description: Supplier reference for our organization (might be our account number at the supplier)

Columns.Name: BankAccountName
Columns.Description: Supplier's bank account name (ie name on the account)

Columns.Name: BankAccountCode
Columns.Description: Supplier's bank account code (usually a numeric reference for the bank branch)

Columns.Name: BankInternationalCode
Columns.Description: Supplier's bank's international code (such as a SWIFT code)

Columns.Name: PaymentDays
Columns.Description: Number of days for payment of an invoice (ie payment terms)

Columns.Name: WebsiteURL
Columns.Description: URL for the website for this supplier

Columns.Name: DeliveryAddressLine1
Columns.Description: First delivery address line for the supplier

Columns.Name: DeliveryAddressLine2
Columns.Description: Second delivery address line for the supplier

Columns.Name: DeliveryPostalCode
Columns.Description: Delivery postal code for the supplier

Columns.Name: DeliveryLocation
Columns.Description: Geographic location for the supplier's office/warehouse

Columns.Name: PostalAddressLine1
Columns.Description: First postal address line for the supplier

Columns.Name: PostalAddressLine2
Columns.Description: Second postal address line for the supplier

Columns.Name: PostalPostalCode
Columns.Description: Postal code for the supplier when sending by mail

Tables.Name: SupplierTransactions
Tables.Description: All financial transactions that are supplier-related

Columns.Name: SupplierTransactionID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used to refer to a supplier transaction within the database

Columns.Name: PurchaseOrderID
Columns.Description: ID of an purchase order (for transactions associated with a purchase order)

Columns.Name: PaymentMethodID
Columns.Description: ID of a payment method (for transactions involving payments)

Columns.Name: SupplierInvoiceNumber
Columns.Description: Invoice number for an invoice received from the supplier

Columns.Name: OutstandingBalance
Columns.Description: Amount still outstanding for this transaction

Columns.Name: FinalizationDate
Columns.Description: Date that this transaction was finalized (if it has been)

Columns.Name: IsFinalized
Columns.Description: Is this transaction finalized (invoices, credits and payments have been matched)

Tables.Name: BuyingGroups
Tables.Description: Customer organizations can be part of groups that exert greater buying power

Columns.Name: BuyingGroupID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a buying group within the database

Columns.Name: BuyingGroupName
Columns.Description: Full name of a buying group that customers can be members of

Tables.Name: CustomerCategories
Tables.Description: Categories for customers (ie restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, etc.)

Columns.Name: CustomerCategoryID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a customer category within the database

Columns.Name: CustomerCategoryName
Columns.Description: Full name of the category that customers can be assigned to

Tables.Name: Customers
Tables.Description: Main entity tables for customers (organizations or individuals)

Columns.Name: CustomerID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a customer within the database

Columns.Name: CustomerName
Columns.Description: Customer's full name (usually a trading name)

Columns.Name: BillToCustomerID
Columns.Description: Customer that this is billed to (usually the same customer but can be another parent company)

Columns.Name: DeliveryMethodID
Columns.Description: Standard delivery method for stock items sent to this customer

Columns.Name: DeliveryCityID
Columns.Description: ID of the delivery city for this address

Columns.Name: PostalCityID
Columns.Description: ID of the postal city for this address

Columns.Name: CreditLimit
Columns.Description: Credit limit for this customer (NULL if unlimited)

Columns.Name: AccountOpenedDate
Columns.Description: Date this customer account was opened

Columns.Name: StandardDiscountPercentage
Columns.Description: Standard discount offered to this customer

Columns.Name: IsStatementSent
Columns.Description: Is a statement sent to this customer? (Or do they just pay on each invoice?)

Columns.Name: IsOnCreditHold
Columns.Description: Is this customer on credit hold? (Prevents further deliveries to this customer)

Columns.Name: PaymentDays
Columns.Description: Number of days for payment of an invoice (ie payment terms)

Columns.Name: DeliveryRun
Columns.Description: Normal delivery run for this customer

Columns.Name: RunPosition
Columns.Description: Normal position in the delivery run for this customer

Columns.Name: WebsiteURL
Columns.Description: URL for the website for this customer

Columns.Name: DeliveryAddressLine1
Columns.Description: First delivery address line for the customer

Columns.Name: DeliveryAddressLine2
Columns.Description: Second delivery address line for the customer

Columns.Name: DeliveryPostalCode
Columns.Description: Delivery postal code for the customer

Columns.Name: DeliveryLocation
Columns.Description: Geographic location for the customer's office/warehouse

Columns.Name: PostalAddressLine1
Columns.Description: First postal address line for the customer

Columns.Name: PostalAddressLine2
Columns.Description: Second postal address line for the customer

Columns.Name: PostalPostalCode
Columns.Description: Postal code for the customer when sending by mail

Tables.Name: CustomerTransactions
Tables.Description: All financial transactions that are customer-related

Columns.Name: CustomerTransactionID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used to refer to a customer transaction within the database

Columns.Name: InvoiceID
Columns.Description: ID of an invoice (for transactions associated with an invoice)

Columns.Name: PaymentMethodID
Columns.Description: ID of a payment method (for transactions involving payments)

Columns.Name: OutstandingBalance
Columns.Description: Amount still outstanding for this transaction

Columns.Name: FinalizationDate
Columns.Description: Date that this transaction was finalized (if it has been)

Columns.Name: IsFinalized
Columns.Description: Is this transaction finalized (invoices, credits and payments have been matched)

Tables.Name: InvoiceLines
Tables.Description: Detail lines from customer invoices

Columns.Name: InvoiceLineID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a line on an invoice within the database

Columns.Name: InvoiceID
Columns.Description: Invoice that this line is associated with

Columns.Name: StockItemID
Columns.Description: Stock item for this invoice line

Columns.Name: Description
Columns.Description: Description of the item supplied (Usually the stock item name but can be overridden)

Columns.Name: LineProfit
Columns.Description: Profit made on this line item at current cost price

Tables.Name: Invoices
Tables.Description: Details of customer invoices

Columns.Name: InvoiceID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to an invoice within the database

Columns.Name: BillToCustomerID
Columns.Description: Bill to customer for this invoice (invoices might be billed to a head office)

Columns.Name: OrderID
Columns.Description: Sales order (if any) for this invoice

Columns.Name: DeliveryMethodID
Columns.Description: How these stock items are beign delivered

Columns.Name: AccountsPersonID
Columns.Description: Customer accounts contact for this invoice

Columns.Name: PackedByPersonID
Columns.Description: Person who packed this shipment (or checked the packing)

Columns.Name: InvoiceDate
Columns.Description: Date that this invoice was raised

Columns.Name: CustomerPurchaseOrderNumber
Columns.Description: Purchase Order Number received from customer

Columns.Name: IsCreditNote
Columns.Description: Is this a credit note (rather than an invoice)

Columns.Name: CreditNoteReason
Columns.Description: Reason that this credit note needed to be generated (if applicable)

Columns.Name: Comments
Columns.Description: Any comments related to this invoice (sent to customer)

Columns.Name: DeliveryInstructions
Columns.Description: Any comments related to delivery (sent to customer)

Columns.Name: InternalComments
Columns.Description: Any internal comments related to this invoice (not sent to the customer)

Columns.Name: TotalDryItems
Columns.Description: Total number of dry packages (information for the delivery driver)

Columns.Name: TotalChillerItems
Columns.Description: Total number of chiller packages (information for the delivery driver)

Columns.Name: RunPosition
Columns.Description: Position in the delivery run for this shipment

Columns.Name: ReturnedDeliveryData
Columns.Description: JSON-structured data returned from delivery devices for deliveries made directly by the organization

Columns.Name: ConfirmedDeliveryTime
Columns.Description: Confirmed delivery date and time promoted from JSON delivery data

Columns.Name: ConfirmedReceivedBy
Columns.Description: Confirmed receiver promoted from JSON delivery data

Tables.Name: OrderLines
Tables.Description: Detail lines from customer orders

Columns.Name: OrderLineID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a line on an Order within the database

Columns.Name: OrderID
Columns.Description: Order that this line is associated with

Columns.Name: StockItemID
Columns.Description: Stock item for this order line (FK not indexed as separate index exists)

Columns.Name: Description
Columns.Description: Description of the item supplied (Usually the stock item name but can be overridden)

Columns.Name: PackageTypeID
Columns.Description: Type of package to be supplied

Columns.Name: PickingCompletedWhen
Columns.Description: When was picking of this line completed?

Tables.Name: Orders
Tables.Description: Detail of customer orders

Columns.Name: OrderID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to an order within the database

Columns.Name: BackorderOrderID
Columns.Description: If this order is a backorder, this column holds the original order number

Columns.Name: OrderDate
Columns.Description: Date that this order was raised

Columns.Name: CustomerPurchaseOrderNumber
Columns.Description: Purchase Order Number received from customer

Columns.Name: IsUndersupplyBackordered
Columns.Description: If items cannot be supplied are they backordered?

Columns.Name: Comments
Columns.Description: Any comments related to this order (sent to customer)

Columns.Name: DeliveryInstructions
Columns.Description: Any comments related to order delivery (sent to customer)

Columns.Name: InternalComments
Columns.Description: Any internal comments related to this order (not sent to the customer)

Columns.Name: PickingCompletedWhen
Columns.Description: When was picking of the entire order completed?

Tables.Name: SpecialDeals
Tables.Description: Special pricing (can include fixed prices, discount $ or discount %)

Columns.Name: SpecialDealID
Columns.Description: ID (sequence based) for a special deal

Columns.Name: StockItemID
Columns.Description: Stock item that the deal applies to (if NULL, then only discounts are permitted not unit prices)

Columns.Name: CustomerID
Columns.Description: ID of the customer that the special pricing applies to (if NULL then all customers)

Columns.Name: BuyingGroupID
Columns.Description: ID of the buying group that the special pricing applies to (optional)

Columns.Name: CustomerCategoryID
Columns.Description: ID of the customer category that the special pricing applies to (optional)

Columns.Name: StockGroupID
Columns.Description: ID of the stock group that the special pricing applies to (optional)

Columns.Name: StartDate
Columns.Description: Date that the special pricing starts from

Columns.Name: EndDate
Columns.Description: Date that the special pricing ends on

Columns.Name: DiscountAmount
Columns.Description: Discount per unit to be applied to sale price (optional)

Columns.Name: DiscountPercentage
Columns.Description: Discount percentage per unit to be applied to sale price (optional)

Columns.Name: UnitPrice
Columns.Description: Special price per unit to be applied instead of sale price (optional)

Tables.Name: Colors
Tables.Description: Stock items can (optionally) have colors

Columns.Name: ColorID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a color within the database

Columns.Name: ColorName
Columns.Description: Full name of a color that can be used to describe stock items

Tables.Name: PackageTypes
Tables.Description: Ways that stock items can be packaged (ie: each, box, carton, pallet, kg, etc.

Columns.Name: PackageTypeID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a package type within the database

Columns.Name: PackageTypeName
Columns.Description: Full name of package types that stock items can be purchased in or sold in

Tables.Name: StockGroups
Tables.Description: Groups for categorizing stock items (ie: novelties, toys, edible novelties, etc.)

Columns.Name: StockGroupID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a stock group within the database

Columns.Name: StockGroupName
Columns.Description: Full name of groups used to categorize stock items

Tables.Name: StockItemHoldings
Tables.Description: Non-temporal attributes for stock items

Columns.Name: StockItemID
Columns.Description: ID of the stock item that this holding relates to (this table holds non-temporal columns for stock)

Columns.Name: BinLocation
Columns.Description: Bin location (ie location of this stock item within the depot)

Columns.Name: LastCostPrice
Columns.Description: Unit cost price the last time this stock item was purchased

Columns.Name: ReorderLevel
Columns.Description: Quantity below which reordering should take place

Tables.Name: StockItems
Tables.Description: Main entity table for stock items

Columns.Name: StockItemID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used for reference to a stock item within the database

Columns.Name: StockItemName
Columns.Description: Full name of a stock item (but not a full description)

Columns.Name: SupplierID
Columns.Description: Usual supplier for this stock item

Columns.Name: UnitPackageID
Columns.Description: Usual package for selling units of this stock item

Columns.Name: OuterPackageID
Columns.Description: Usual package for selling outers of this stock item (ie cartons, boxes, etc.)

Columns.Name: Brand
Columns.Description: Brand for the stock item (if the item is branded)

Columns.Name: LeadTimeDays
Columns.Description: Number of days typically taken from order to receipt of this stock item

Columns.Name: QuantityPerOuter
Columns.Description: Quantity of the stock item in an outer package

Columns.Name: IsChillerStock
Columns.Description: Does this stock item need to be in a chiller?

Columns.Name: UnitPrice
Columns.Description: Selling price (ex-tax) for one unit of this product

Columns.Name: RecommendedRetailPrice
Columns.Description: Recommended retail price for this stock item

Columns.Name: TypicalWeightPerUnit
Columns.Description: Typical weight for one unit of this product (packaged)

Columns.Name: MarketingComments
Columns.Description: Marketing comments for this stock item (shared outside the organization)

Columns.Name: CustomFields
Columns.Description: Custom fields added by system users

Columns.Name: Tags
Columns.Description: Advertising tags associated with this stock item (JSON array retrieved from CustomFields)

Columns.Name: SearchDetails
Columns.Description: Combination of columns used by full text search

Tables.Name: StockItemStockGroups
Tables.Description: Which stock items are in which stock groups

Columns.Name: StockItemStockGroupID
Columns.Description: Internal reference for this linking row

Columns.Name: StockItemID
Columns.Description: Stock item assigned to this stock group (FK indexed via unique constraint)

Columns.Name: StockGroupID
Columns.Description: StockGroup assigned to this stock item (FK indexed via unique constraint)

Tables.Name: StockItemTransactions
Tables.Description: Transactions covering all movements of all stock items

Columns.Name: StockItemTransactionID
Columns.Description: Numeric ID used to refer to a stock item transaction within the database

Columns.Name: InvoiceID
Columns.Description: ID of an invoice (for transactions associated with an invoice)

Columns.Name: SupplierID
Columns.Description: Supplier for this stock transaction (if applicable)

Columns.Name: PurchaseOrderID
Columns.Description: ID of an purchase order (for transactions associated with a purchase order)

Columns.Name: TransactionOccurredWhen
Columns.Description: Date and time when the transaction occurred

Columns.Name: Quantity
Columns.Description: Quantity of stock movement (positive is incoming stock, negative is outgoing)
